3705.verse: وَلَوْ|And if|58|73|179$يُؤَاخِذُ ٱللَّهُ|Allah (were to) punish|166|196|10010$ٱلنَّاسَ|the people|90|120|446$بِمَا|for what|76|106|43$كَسَبُواْ|they have earned,|142|172|1788$مَا|not|42|57|262$تَرَكَ|He would leave|120|126|1562$عَلَىٰ|on|63|76|52$ظَهْرِهَا|its back|89|102|14432$مِن|any|50|63|53$دَآبَّةٍ|creature.|81|94|1429$وَلَـٰكِن|But|81|94|108$يُؤَخِّرُهُمْ|He gives them respite|164|170|9660$إِلَىٰٓ|till|53|62|118$أَجَلٍ|a term|63|81|6760$مُّسَمًّىۖ|appointed.|90|108|5411$فَإِذَا|And when|85|103|1730$جَآءَ|comes|62|80|4023$أَجَلُهُمْ|their term,|90|108|6367$فَإِنَّ|then indeed,|103|121|599$ٱللَّهَ|Allah|53|62|184$كَانَ|is|57|164|913$بِعِبَادِهِۦ|of His slaves|103|318|10335$بَصِيرَۢا|All-Seer.|86|193|14433$

3710.verse: تَنزِيلَ|A revelation|99|174|14435$ٱلْعَزِيزِ|(of) the All-Mighty,|148|297|3257$ٱلرَّحِيمِ|the Most Merciful,|140|214|4$

3711.verse: لِتُنذِرَ|That you may warn|149|164|6243$قَوْمًا|a people|76|106|3073$مَّآ|not|42|72|262$أُنذِرَ|were warned|105|135|14436$ءَابَآؤُهُمْ|their forefathers,|133|163|1476$فَهُمْ|so they|70|85|152$غَـٰفِلُونَ|(are) heedless.|120|120|6051$

3713.verse: إِنَّا|Indeed, We|96|103|120$جَعَلْنَا|[We] have placed|138|152|1137$فِىٓ|on|48|62|89$أَعْنَـٰقِهِمْ|their necks|93|108|9340$أَغْلَـٰلاً|iron collars,|96|110|14438$فَهِىَ|and they|79|94|709$إِلَى|(are up)to|88|95|118$ٱلْأَذْقَانِ|the chins,|86|176|14439$فَهُم|so they|70|250|152$مُّقْمَحُونَ|(are with) heads aloft.|170|260|14440$

3714.verse: وَجَعَلْنَا|And We have made|148|165|4805$مِنۢ بَيْنِ أَيْدِيهِمْ|before them|156|190|14441$سَدًّا|a barrier|75|109|11013$وَمِنْ خَلْفِهِمْ|and behind them|130|164|14442$سَدًّا|a barrier.|80|97|11013$فَأَغْشَيْنَـٰهُمْ|and We covered them,|171|214|14443$فَهُمْ|so they|70|156|152$لَا|(do) not|75|161|30$يُبْصِرُونَ|see.|110|153|7019$

3715.verse: وَسَوَآءٌ|And it (is) same|125|133|14444$عَلَيْهِمْ|to them|73|90|22$ءَأَنذَرْتَهُمْ|whether you warn them|178|194|61$أَمْ|or|38|54|62$لَمْ|(do) not|75|92|63$تُنذِرْهُمْ|warn them,|95|112|64$لَا|not|42|50|30$يُؤْمِنُونَ|they will believe.|131|131|35$

3716.verse: إِنَّمَا|Only|55|75|102$تُنذِرُ|you (can) warn|122|163|14372$مَنِ|(him) who|86|127|1673$ٱتَّبَعَ|follows|65|106|3459$ٱلذِّكْرَ|the Reminder|106|147|9717$وَخَشِىَ|and fears|87|107|14445$ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنَ|the Most Gracious|140|149|10589$بِٱلْغَيْبِۖ|in the unseen.|115|134|36$فَبَشِّرْهُ|So give him glad tidings|176|194|13795$بِمَغْفِرَةٍ|of forgiveness|113|132|14446$وَأَجْرٍ|and a reward|107|116|14447$كَرِيمٍ|noble.|68|68|12877$

3717.verse: إِنَّا|Indeed, We|96|114|120$نَحْنُ|We|62|98|103$نُحْىِ|[We] give life|109|145|9747$ٱلْمَوْتَىٰ|(to) the dead|110|146|704$وَنَكْتُبُ|and We record|117|153|14448$مَا|what|53|71|262$قَدَّمُواْ|they have sent before|168|177|14449$وَءَاثَـٰرَهُمْۚ|and their footprints,|153|172|14450$وَكُلَّ|and every|86|104|10260$شَىْءٍ|thing|69|88|186$أَحْصَيْنَـٰهُ|We have enumerated it|175|184|14451$فِىٓ|in|48|167|89$إِمَامٍ|a Register|86|324|14452$مُّبِينٍ|clear.|66|185|3469$

3705.verse: And if Allah were to impose blame on the people for what they have earned, He would not leave upon the earth any creature. But He defers them for a specified term. And when their time comes, then indeed Allah has ever been, of His servants, Seeing.

3708.verse: Indeed you, [O Muhammad], are from among the messengers,

3710.verse: [This is] a revelation of the Exalted in Might, the Merciful,

3711.verse: That you may warn a people whose forefathers were not warned, so they are unaware.

3712.verse: Already the word has come into effect upon most of them, so they do not believe.

3713.verse: Indeed, We have put shackles on their necks, and they are to their chins, so they are with heads [kept] aloft.

3714.verse: And We have put before them a barrier and behind them a barrier and covered them, so they do not see.

3715.verse: And it is all the same for them whether you warn them or do not warn them - they will not believe.

3716.verse: You can only warn one who follows the message and fears the Most Merciful unseen. So give him good tidings of forgiveness and noble reward.

3717.verse: Indeed, it is We who bring the dead to life and record what they have put forth and what they left behind, and all things We have enumerated in a clear register.
